children.name: value
children.description: Change the value of the gauge.

children.name: imageDataURL
Example - show a snapshot of the gauge

children.description: Returns a PNG image of the gauge encoded as a [Data URL](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/data_URIs).> This method is obsoleted and replaced by [exportImage](#methods-exportImage), but will remain fully functional.

children.name: svg
children.description: Returns the [SVG](http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/) representation of the gauge.The returned string is a self-contained SVG document that can be used as is orconverted to other formats using tools like [Inkscape](http://inkscape.org/) and[ImageMagick](http://www.imagemagick.org/).Both programs provide command-line interface suitable for server-side processing.> This method is obsoleted by [exportSVG](#methods-exportSVG), but will remain fully functional.

children.name: resize

parameters.name: force `Boolean` *optional*
parameters.description: Defines whether the widget should proceed with resizing even if the element dimensions have not changed.

children.description: Adjusts the widget layout to match the size of the container.

children.name: redraw
children.description: Redraws the gauge.

children.name: exportSVG
Example - Exporting a chart to an SVG document

parameters.name: options.raw `Boolean` *(default: false)*
parameters.description: Resolves the promise with the raw SVG document without the Data URI prefix.

children.description: Exports the Gauge as an SVG document.The result can be saved using [kendo.saveAs](/api/javascript/kendo#methods-saveAs).The export operation is asynchronous and returns a [promise](http://api.jquery.com/Types/#Promise).The promise will be resolved with a SVG document encoded as a [Data URI](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/data_URIs).

children.name: exportPDF
Example - Exporting a chart to a PDF file

parameters.name: options `kendo.drawing.PDFOptions` *(optional)*
parameters.description: Parameters for the exported PDF file.

children.description: Exports the Gauge as a PDF file.The result can be saved using [kendo.saveAs](/api/javascript/kendo#methods-saveAs).The export operation is asynchronous and returns a [promise](http://api.jquery.com/Types/#Promise).The promise will be resolved with a PDF file encoded as a [Data URI](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/data_URIs).

children.name: exportImage
Example - Exporting a Gauge to an image

parameters.name: options.height `String`
parameters.description: The height of the exported image. Defaults to the Gauge height.

parameters.name: options.width `String`
parameters.description: The width of the exported image. Defaults to the Gauge width.

children.description: Exports the Gauge as an image.The result can be saved using [kendo.saveAs](/api/javascript/kendo#methods-saveAs).The export operation is asynchronous and returns a [promise](http://api.jquery.com/Types/#Promise).The promise will be resolved with a PNG image encoded as a [Data URI](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/data_URIs).

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the Gauge for safe removal from the DOM.Detaches event handlers and removes data entries in order to avoid memory leaks.

children.name: allValues

parameters.name: values `Array`
parameters.description: An array of values to be set.

children.description: Allows setting or getting multiple Gauge values at once.

children.name: transitions
children.description: A value indicating if transition animations should be played.

children.name: scale.startAngle
children.description: The start angle of the gauge.The gauge is rendered clockwise(0 degrees are the 180 degrees in the polar coordinat system)

children.name: scale.reverse
children.description: Reverses the scale direction - values are increase anticlockwise.

children.name: scale.rangeDistance
children.description: The distance from the range indicators to the ticks.

children.name: scale.rangeSize
children.description: The width of the range indicators.

children.name: scale.rangePlaceholderColor
children.description: The default color for the ranges.

children.name: scale.ranges.color
children.description: The color of the range.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: scale.ranges.opacity
children.description: The opacity of the range.

children.name: scale.ranges.to
children.description: The end position of the range in scale units.

children.name: scale.ranges.from
children.description: The start position of the range in scale units.

children.name: scale.ranges
children.description: The ranges of the scale.

children.name: scale.minorUnit
children.description: The interval between minor divisions.

children.name: scale.minorTicks.width
children.description: The width of the minor ticks.

children.name: scale.minorTicks.visible
children.description: The visibility of the minor ticks.

children.name: scale.minorTicks.size
children.description: The minor tick size.This is the length of the line in pixels that is drawn to indicate the tick on the scale.

children.name: scale.minorTicks.color
children.description: The color of the minor ticks.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: scale.minorTicks
children.description: Configures the scale minor ticks.

children.name: scale.min
children.description: The minimum value of the scale.

children.name: scale.max
children.description: The maximum value of the scale.

children.name: scale.majorUnit
children.description: The interval between major divisions.

children.name: scale.majorTicks.width
children.description: The width of the major ticks.

children.name: scale.majorTicks.visible
children.description: The visibility of the major ticks.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: scale.majorTicks.size
children.description: The major tick size.This is the length of the line in pixels that is drawn to indicate the tick on the scale.

children.name: scale.majorTicks.color
children.description: The color of the major ticks.

children.name: scale.majorTicks
children.description: Configures the scale major ticks.

children.name: scale.labels.visible
children.description: The visibility of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.template
children.description: The label template.Template variables:*   **value** - the value

children.name: scale.labels.position
children.description: The labels positions.

children.name: scale.labels.padding.right
children.description: The right padding of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.padding.left
children.description: The left padding of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.padding.bottom
children.description: The bottom padding of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.padding.top
children.description: The top padding of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.padding
children.description: The padding of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.margin.right
children.description: The right margin of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.margin.left
children.description: The left margin of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.margin.bottom
children.description: The bottom margin of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.margin.top
children.description: The top margin of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.margin
children.description: The margin of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.format
children.description: The format of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.font
children.description: The font style of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.color
children.description: The text color of the labels.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: scale.labels.border.width
children.description: The width of the border.

children.name: scale.labels.border.opacity
children.description: The opacity of the border. By default the border is opaque.

children.name: scale.labels.border.dashType
children.description: The dash type of the border.

children.name: scale.labels.border.color
children.description: The color of the border. Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: scale.labels.border
children.description: The border of the labels.

children.name: scale.labels.background
children.description: The background color of the labels.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb

children.name: scale.labels
children.description: Configures the scale labels.

children.name: scale.endAngle
children.description: The end angle of the gauge.The gauge is rendered clockwise(0 degrees are the 180 degrees in the polar coordinat system)

children.name: scale
children.description: Configures the scale.

children.name: renderAs
Example - Render as Canvas, if supported

children.description: Sets the preferred rendering engine.If it is not supported by the browser, the Gauge will switch to the first available mode.The supported values are:* "svg" - renders the widget as inline SVG document, if available* "vml" - renders the widget as VML, if available* "canvas" - renders the widget as a Canvas element, if available.> Using Canvas rendering disables most interactive features.

children.name: pointer.value
children.description: The value of the gauge.

children.name: pointer.color
children.description: The color of the pointer.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: pointer.cap.size
children.description: The size of the cap in percents. (from 0 to 1)

children.name: pointer.cap.color
children.description: The color of the cap.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: pointer.cap
children.description: The cap configuration options.

children.name: pointer
children.description: The pointer configuration options. It accepts an `Array` of pointers, each with it's own configuration options.

children.name: gaugeArea.width
children.description: The width of the gauge area.  By default the vertical gauge is 60pxand horizontal gauge is 200px.

children.name: gaugeArea.margin.right
children.description: The right margin of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.margin.left
children.description: The left margin of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.margin.bottom
children.description: The bottom margin of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.margin.top
children.description: The top margin of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.margin
children.description: The margin of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.height
children.description: The height of the gauge area.  By default, the vertical gauge is 200px andthe horizontal one is 60px.

children.name: gaugeArea.border.width
children.description: The width of the border.

children.name: gaugeArea.border.opacity
children.description: The opacity of the border. By default the border is opaque.

children.name: gaugeArea.border.dashType
children.description: The dash type of the border.

children.name: gaugeArea.border.color
children.description: The color of the border. Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: gaugeArea.border
children.description: The border of the gauge area.

children.name: gaugeArea.background
children.description: The background of the gauge area.Any valid CSS color string will work here, including hex and rgb.

children.name: gaugeArea
children.description: The gauge area configuration options.This is the entire visible area of the gauge.
